Class ProgressMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      evs.gui.windows.ProgressMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUICommunicator, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ProgressMonitor
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements GUICommunicator

Processing dialog which returns a boolean false on close.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com
See Also:
Serialized Form
